entry.title: Vite report on Sat, 07 Oct 2023 20:01:48
entry.summary:
Tech:
- NOV Inc. shares acquired by Ceredex Value Advisors
- Shell using Fortnite, TikTok, etc. to convince kids fossil fuels are cool
- John Carmack and Rich Sutton partner to accelerate development of AGI
- Google DeepMind releases Open X-Embodiment to help advance how robots can learn new skills
- Apple iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro overheating fix

Business:
- Target closing 9 locations over crime, but New York City crime stats tell another story
- A couple bought a 1940s house owned by a family of hoarders
- Take a look inside Florida's new golf course with a $1 million membership fee and private yacht club
- You can buy an abandoned Colorado ski resort for $7 million
- The secretive company that might end privacy as we know it

AI:
- John Carmack and Rich Sutton partner to accelerate development of AGI
- Google DeepMind releases Open X-Embodiment to help advance how robots can learn new skills
- Study finds that police "crime predicting" AI fails miserably at predicting crimes

Insights:
- Jeremy Grantham predicts a crash in the S&P 500, house price slide, and a recession
- Gen Z worker in Spain shares his savings strategy
- Personal loan and mortgage interest rates today
- The student loan payment restart puts pressure on the economy
- One in ten chatbot users are interested in sexual content
- Your evil car is filling the ocean with microplastics

Summary:
- The tech section highlights advancements in AI, partnerships, and product fixes.
- The business section covers store closures, unique real estate purchases, and privacy concerns.
- The AI section discusses the limitations of crime-predicting AI.
- Overall, the report showcases a mix of technology, business, and AI news, with insights on financial trends and societal impacts.
